plot: An American tourist is in Paris to take photographs for his wife who couldn't travel with him. He quickly realizes that he won't be able to finish his quest because a hitman follows him in order to kill him.
title: The Last Photograph
plot_es: An American tourist is in Paris to take photographs for his wife who couldn't travel with him. He quickly realizes that he won't be able to finish his quest because a hitman follows him in order to kill him.
plot_en: An American tourist is in Paris to take photographs for his wife who couldn't travel with him. He quickly realizes that he won't be able to finish his quest because a hitman follows him in order to kill him.
